SEARCH
Package com.sulfurengine.io

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
com.sulfurengine.io.Scene
public class Scene extends Object
Represents a scene in the game world, containing entities and background settings.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Spriterenderer
    background
    The background sprite renderer for the scene.
    Camera
    camera
    The camera associated with the scene.

      Parameters:
